Literature.Title: Antibacterial Effects of a Cell-Penetrating Peptide Isolated from Kefir.
Literature.Author: Miao J, Guo H, Chen F, Zhao L, He L, Ou Y, Huang M, Zhang Y, Guo B, Cao Y, Huang Q

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=125±1.29µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 63589(MIC=500±3.23µg/ml),Salmonella enterica CMCC 9812(MIC=500±4.14µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae CMCC 50071(MIC=500±1.93µg/ml),Bacillus thuringiensis CMCC 9812(MIC=125±2.21µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ACCC 30005(MIC=500±3.43µg/ml),Aspergillus flavus CGMCC 3.2890(MIC=500±4.73µg/ml),Rhizopus stolonifer AS3.4997(MIC=500±4.11µg/ml),Penicillium glaucum STL 3501(MIC=500±0.23µg/ml)
